definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: in Galilee (Naphtali), [[כִּנֶּרֶת]] De 3:17, Jos 13:27, Nu 34:11; [[כִּנׇּ֑רֶת]] Jos 19:35; [[כִּֽנְַַרוֹת]] (so Baer; [[כִּֽנְרוֹת]] Norzi) Jos 11:2, Jos 12:3, 1Ki 15:20; —
a city Jos 19:35 (P; LXX B Kenereq, A Xenereq, LXXL Xenereq, as always exc. Jos 13:27), so prob. Jos 11:2 (D ?; B Kenerwq, A Xenereqqi), De 3:17 (B Maxanareq;—Max- = ´[[מִבּ]]).

[[יׇם־כִּנֶּרֶת]], lake near the city, Nu 34:11 (P; LXX B Xenara, A Xenereq), Jos 13:27 (P; LXX B Xenereq; A LXXL Xenerwq), [[יׇם כִּֽנְַַרוֹת]] Jos 12:3 (D; LXX B Xenereq; A Xennereq); [[כָּל־כִּֽנְַַרוֹת]] 1Ki 15:20 = all the territory about the city and lake, cf. pa=san th\ngh=n Xenereq LXXL,—Targum has [[גִּינֵסַר]], [[גְּנֵיסַר]], [[גִּנּׁסַר]], cf. to\ u(/dwr tou= Gennhsar 1 Makk. 1Ma 11:67; Gennhsaret Mk 6:53, Mt 14:34, Lu 5:1; etymol. connexion with [[כִּנֶּרֶת]] disputed by GASm:Geogr. 443 n. Buhl:Geogr. 113 n.—On the lake and surrounding region v. GASm:Geogr. Ch. xxi. Bd:Pal 254 Buhl:Geogr. 113 f. 225 Furrer:ZPV. 1879 (ii.), 52–74 Frei:ib. 1886 (ix.), 81–145 van Kasteren:ib. 1888 (xi.), 212–248.
